mvt_properties.Title: Time
mvt_properties.Description: A default label containing the orbit track element’s time of day (24hr:mi) with optional day offset (e.g. ‘01:28 (+1)’).

mvt_properties.Title: Date & Time
mvt_properties.Description: The full date and time of the orbit track element (e.g. ‘2019/09/12 18:58:00+00’).

mvt_properties.Title: Day/Night Flag
mvt_properties.Description: Indicates whether the satellite was retrieving data in a 'Day', 'Night', or 'Both' (Transitional) state.  For non-sun synchronous orbits, a value of 'N/A' is provided.

mvt_properties.Title: Direction of Travel
mvt_properties.Description: Indicates whether the satellite is ascending, descending, or transitioning between directions.

mvt_properties.Title: Identifier
mvt_properties.Description: A unique identifier for the orbit track element.

mvt_properties.Title: Hour
mvt_properties.Description: Integer value for the hour component of the Datetime attribute.

mvt_properties.Title: Minute
mvt_properties.Description: Integer value for the minute component of the Datetime attribute.

mvt_properties.Title: Day Offset
mvt_properties.Description: Indicates whether the orbit track element represents a datetime that is before ('-1'), equal to ('0'), or after ('+1') the requested data day.
